meaning: She wears the various kalās (arts, phases) as a garland around Her neck.
commentary: Kalās are of various types. There are the 16 kalas, 64 arts (kalas), the 96 kalas, the kalas (aspects) pertaining to the Sun, moon, agni, vidya and so on. The tejas that controls the glow/fire in the Sun and agni is the kala.
